summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Sections 5.3, 15.1, 16.1, 17.1, 17A.1, 18.1, 24.91 and 24.921 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300) to prohibit certain signs in the Pioneer Square and International Special Review Districts, to prohibit certain roof signs in zones other than the M, IG and IH Zones, and to terminate certain nonconforming signs.
